thread.title: Twitter: Shruti Haasan: Going vegan one of the best decisions I took
thread.title_full: Twitter: Shruti Haasan: Going vegan one of the best decisions I took | Hindi Movie News - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Twitter: Shruti Haasan: Going vegan one of the best decisions I took
text:
Actress-singer Shruti Haasan says she has been on a vegan and dairy-free diet for four months now and is one of the best decisions she took. The 31-year-old took to Twitter where she revealed embracing veganism was key to her healthy and happy self.
Is Shruti Haasan dating this London-based actor? Cupid has struck another Bollywood starlet, who has managed to keep her relationship with a London-based Italian actor under wraps until now.
"I've been vegan and dairy free for the past four months and it's been one of the best decisions of my life!! #stayhealthy #eatright #happy," Shruti tweeted.
I've been vegan and dairy free for the past four months and it's been one of the best decisions of my life !! #stayhealthy #eatright #happy
— shruti haasan (@shrutihaasan) February 23, 2017 On the work front, the actress will star in 'Behen Hogi Teri', alongside Rajkummar Rao this year.
Shruti shares why she is so choosy about films 00:24
